website_summaries.verdict: These cornhole bags are thoughtfully made to provide quality and durability that’s almost unmatched, making these the best on the market.
pros: Set of 8 bags is weather resistant and dries well after rain exposure
Simulated corn filling makes bags easy to grasp and throw while mitigating the risk of attracting mice or critters
cons: Color of bags may run a bit the first few times they get wet

customer_reviews.title: Stitches split after 5 minutes of play.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, ordered these because of all the great reviews, they appear nice upon arrival but are actually constructed very poorly. They didn't even double stitch the visible stitch in the bags. After playing with them for 5 minutes one seam split completely open. We were camping and thankfully I had a sewing kit with me and was able to sew them back together. See picture, I added the black stitches because the original orange stitching came out about 2 inches and would have continued to split open if it had not been mended. My set was made in Thailand. For the price these should be much better constructed!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: These things really take a beating
customer_reviews.text: I know it isn’t practical to play cornhole in the rain, but if you’re tied at 20, a storm won’t stop you. And it doesn’t have to with these bags! Just set them somewhere to dry and you’re good to go. I’ve done this at least 3 times and the bags are holding up great. This is my second set purchased for a set of boards built for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Okie

customer_reviews.title: Great Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: These cornhole bags arrived in great time and have been used and used by many folks. The construction is excellent and design is exactly what I was looking for. I am particularly glad I chose these water resistant bags since we have encountered rain several times while using them. They stood up wonderfully to the rain and were ready to go after allowing them to dry. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: RFR

customer_reviews.title: I give them a "10" - Cornhole bags
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these because our other bags had real corn in them and they ended up getting rained on when we were camping. So I was excited to see Weather resistant material and simulated corn for these bags. We used them for the first time yesterday for Fathers Day and they are perfect. I thought I wouldn't like the fabric, but it's absolutely fine. I think I even throw better with these bags. But they are very nice and so glad I purchased them. I recommend these to anyone, you won't be disappointed! I give them a 10! Happy Cornhole player!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and durability
customer_reviews.text: I've reviewed these bags before, but for some reason my review never sticks. These are of great quality. I make cornhole sets for family and friends and these are by far easier to order than making your own filled with corn. Not only are they well made, but the filling will not attract bugs or mice. Another great thing is that the filling will not break down like corn does with excessive use. I will continue to buy these for the boards I build and when my original bags go bad on my own set I guarantee that's what will replace mine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Great weight, sturdy, durable
customer_reviews.text: Took a while before I used these guys , but when we took them out of the box, they where great! Used them on gravel pavement with our board, and yes, I miss the board many times ( refreshments sometimes helps that happen) but they are very durable! The fact they are made with plastic pellets make these guys dust free, and they should be critter proof when stored ( had that issue with other corn bags). I could have spent more for bags, but with these bags made with plastic pellets, correct weight, and very well stitched and tough skin, there is no need to waste money! These guys are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SS Tex

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: Bought these at the end of the summer season last year, so they haven't had a full season of use yet, but they've been great so far. I can attest to their weather resistance. We played in the rain a few times and the bags held up great. Wet cornhole is a whole different game! Bags dried out fine in the sun. Haven't put them through the wash yet, but imagine that will be OK too. Happy cornholing!
customer_reviews.author: M. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bags for our new cornhole game. They are regulation size and weight. The material is sturdy and weather proof (left out overnight and sprinklers got them) and the seams are holding well. They have endured several intense games and stood up to being thrown across the yard (because some people are sore losers). Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grlfrnd

customer_reviews.title: Weather resistance is best!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these game bags after discovering that ours were molding and full of bugs. My daughter made them in tech class along with the cornhole game boards. Hers were filled with corn feed and although we stored them away from moisture they were rotting. She used the new weather resistant bags during her high school graduation party along with 30+ friends and family. They held up great! No issues with the stitching noted. A few were also accidentally tossed into our pool during play. We dried them out and have had no issues with mold even months later.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bags!
customer_reviews.text: I probably spent way to much time reading cornhole bag reviews on Amazon before finally pulling the trigger on this set. And so far they have lived up to all the glowing reviews and we have not had any issues with defects or anything. We're far from highly skilled competitive cornhole players but we do have fun whipping these things around the backyard with our kids and friends. Overall I would give then a hearty two thumbs up and definitely wouldn't hesitate to purchase more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lokiparts

customer_reviews.title: Too often these bags won't drop through hole.
customer_reviews.text: 4 and even 3 corners will hold these bags from falling into hole even when dead center! i have had this happen on about a third of the time. and then other bags won't even push them through. so it becomes a pile up over the hole. the bags seem to be good quality, but they are not worth playing with cause of this gravity defying issue. i even let them stay out in the sun every day and i tossed them everyday for 30 days. but they are still rigid and won't go through the hole consistently. so i will have to buy some other ones now. :( waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: aarrggg

customer_reviews.title: These have been great so far
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased some handmade cornhole boards for my back yard. It's a space that has mulch and dirt everywhere. I wanted some weatherproof bags to use that wouldn't attract insects or critters. These have definitely fit the bill. They've been thrown in dirt, mulch, and have gotten a little wet. Zero issues. They also feel great and very sturdy. I knew right out of the packaging that I had made the right purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Manzella

customer_reviews.title: Faded in two days being left out
customer_reviews.text: So these bags are awesome, I actually have like five other sets. I did need more for a recent party and ordered these and another set. They faded after two days being left out. I was shocked to be honest because I remembered the ones at home never faded and these ones that did were a gift. We always tucked ours in our garage at the end of using them I guess (although I could have sworn we had left them out) the fade on the new sets was pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: The bags are fine. The biggest issue is there are the correct weight! That is the most important. But I was thinking when I bought these that there should be two different fabrics on each side. One for sliding the corn hole bag and the other side should be a tad sticking for non-sliding throws. These bags didn't have that. The good ones do. But these are good for practice because of the weight issue.
customer_reviews.author: William A.

customer_reviews.title: So far.....
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I tend to play 3-4 games a day on average and I bought a set at a local sporting goods store, 2 of them did well but the other 2 were breaking. I wasn't sure what to do but decided on these based off the reviews. So far, probably 20 games in, they are holding up very well. The weights/sizes seem to be consistant as well and the price seems right. If (when???) I need more in the future I would buy these again. The other nice thing, all the different colors being offered! Support these and buy them, I don't think you will be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Senatori

customer_reviews.title: Almost too sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using different corn hole bags and finally needed some new ones and really wanted some weatherproof ones. I went with these ones based off the reviews and I kinda wish I hadn't. I've played corn hole for awhile and these are without a doubt the sturdiest and stiffest bags I've used which isn't a good thing. I thought at first they just needed broken in, but I've been playing with them for awhile and they aren't getting better. Also, wouldn't recommend getting light colors. My gray bags already almost look green from all the grass stains.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hunt

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these bags a couple times in the past and am not sure why the product has changed. These recent bags are so thick in your hand and overstuffed that they will not even fall into the hole, they just sit on top of it with each corner catching like a starfish. I am very disappointed in this most recent product received.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Highter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and definitely weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: These are possibly the best Cornhole bags I've used. The material is very thick, and the stitching is quite solid. We played in and out of the rain last weekend, and the only signs they were used was the dirt. Going to try to wash these with mild detergent this weekend to get the stains off before storing them. The artificial corn/filler is the only reason we can wash these. Those filled with real corn can't be washed without replacing the corn and sewing them back up.
customer_reviews.author: ITGeek

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for tourneys or just camping fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags. This is the 8th set I’ve bought over the last year. I built a set of boards for myself using these bags and have since been asked to build a bunch more for friends. I use these bags for every set. They are very sturdy, with 3 sets being used in a weekly league, seeing about 2-3 hours of steady use each week, showing no signs of deterioration. Sizes are consistent and they have a great weight and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Seams are too rigid. Bags will not drop through hole.
customer_reviews.text: Corner seams are too rigid. Bags will not drop through the hole. The corners hang up and wedge themselves on the edge of the hole.This is a heavier material than is used by other suppliers of bags. It is like CarHart material. I was pleased with 2 day delivery. Bags are all the same weight, 16 oz. Bags feel good,throw well, slide well. I own 5 different sets of bags and play regularly. These are the only bags I have ever used that wedge themselves on top of the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Mama

customer_reviews.title: Solid bags, but not a big fan
customer_reviews.text: These bags have a good weight, are sturdy, and water proof. Unfortunately, I think they are too stuffed, so when they land on the board, they land with a big thud and do not slide well at all. This is a personal preference, but I've bought two sets of these now and found much better ones to fit my style and preference.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Smell is Very Very Strong
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but I figured I would warn people about the super strong smell these arrive with. These have been out of the packaging for over a week and these still have an insane chemical smell. My hands even smell like this handling them a week after opening the box. These should be aired out somehow before they ship, trust me it'll smell up your entire house. They seem to be made of really strong material and the colors are nice though. If the smell goes away and they last a few years then I'll be happy. Make sure to open the package outside and leave them outside to air out for over a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What’s that smell?
customer_reviews.text: I just received these and could not wait to open them. We haven’t tested these out yet but they feel very sturdy. As soon as I opened the box, I couldn’t believe the smell they had. It smells of mildew. I don’t know if it’s the fill in the bags or the bags themselves but these things stink! I will update once I can get the smell out and see how they hold up throwing cornhole.
customer_reviews.author: Hribal

customer_reviews.title: Bags are too stiff
customer_reviews.text: These bags get points for sturdiness and durability but I don’t like the feel of them. Although they weigh and measure out as “official” they don’t feel right. The bags feel over stuffed and too stiff. Maybe they need a long break in period but they were so stiff they would get stuck in the hole! See pics for examples. I believe friends have purchased other brands that were more broke in and ready to play. Maybe one day these bags will be suitable but I’m pretty disappointed and would advise caution if you are deciding on purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: MasterDadster

customer_reviews.title: Quality bags
customer_reviews.text: The weight and feel is spot on. I was hesitant about ordering a synthetic filling over traditional corn. But after a mouse ate my bags, I'm in. No dust either! These are good bags.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: We love our new cornhole bags!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using our red & black cornhole bags for almost a year now. They are durable, resistant to mold (big deal here in Florida) and have held up perfectly. The stitching is consistent and secure. The colors are vibrant and have not faded. We do keep them in the garage when not in use, not left out in the weather. We would recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie C.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. High quality, high end bags.
customer_reviews.text: We're amateur players, but our son is a serious player. These bags met with everyone's approval. Have had for about a year now and they are in just as good of condition as when we bought them. No compromise on the seams. No wear on the fabric. Really made well. Can't go wrong with buying corn hole bags from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: dreaming-of-ireland

customer_reviews.title: If you play corn hole in the dirt, these may be for you
customer_reviews.text: We tend to play our corn hole games outside in some dirty, dusty conditions. My previous bags with corn were almost impossible to tell which color was which, plus there was probably more dirt than corn in the bags after hundreds of games. These bags are heavy duty and appear well made. They have a little more bounce to them but do the job. I like the idea of being able to rinse them without destroying them. We'll see how they hold up but I don't think that'll be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Seem sturdy so far!
customer_reviews.text: We had cornhole bags that came with our boards. Unfortunately they were real corn and the squirrels ripped them open. So, we ordered these to replace them. So far they seem much sturdier and hopefully the resin pellets will not be as attractive to the squirrels. We have also been much more careful not to leave them out though so that has helped!
customer_reviews.author: Toothdoctormom

customer_reviews.title: So far So Good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these bags today so that's why only 3 stars. Out the bags (shipping bag) they felt stiff flat like a pancake. So I'm thinking with a little breaking in they should turn out to be awesome bags. Quality stitching and heavy duty duck canvas. Bag weights were spot on with each other weighing 15.90 oz. They are heavier than my old bags so trying to get use to them. Also don't know what material was used on the beads but they felt like they were stuck together.
customer_reviews.author: Big Kahuna

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had these long enough to say that they are going to last for a long period of time but they are constructed very well so I don't have any worries! The fabric, weight and the colors are great and the match the red, white and blue corn hole game that we made. Our family loves to play the game and that is what it is all about!
customer_reviews.author: cjp

customer_reviews.title: Solid Sturdy Bean Bags
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a cornhole set, they are durable and well made. The stitching is solid and after several games in we've not seen any issues. The material is a denser denim like material that lends to the durability and sturdiness of the bags. I'd recommend these for play for corn hole or any other activity asking for bean bags.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer in California

customer_reviews.title: The Highest Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are so well made, they will literally need to be broken in to work right. The tough duck fabric is stiff and allows a slide shot to straddle a 6" hole without falling in when brand new. A couple hundred tosses should loosen them up. They are certainly weighty as they should be, and the texture of the synthetic fill beads feels pretty good in the hand. The response on the board is excellent. These are great to complete your regulation set, won't work with those knock off travel style sets with 5" diameter hole as these are 6"x6". Quality product, regulation 6"x6" @ 16oz., every color, fast delivery...great buy
customer_reviews.author: MATT

customer_reviews.title: Took a beating all summer and still in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot make your own bags of this quality for anywhere near the price. You just can't. Your sewing machine will not handle the heavy duck. Finding the heavy duck proved difficult. The time you spend on making your own will cost more than having these 8 bags shipped to your door.
customer_reviews.author: Boi Named Sous

customer_reviews.title: Thank you to the employees who sent this
customer_reviews.text: This company sent me these bags fedex during the corona virus lock down. Was it essential? No. Was it appreciated? Heck yes! I have four teenagers in lock down and I really am grateful to have outside activities to do. Thank you. Update: lazy teens left one outside under a bush for a month. It just kinda dry rotted. If I told them once I told them a million times, thoose bags aren't going to pick THEMSELVES up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Takacs

customer_reviews.title: Great Corn Bags-Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The bags are constructed of high quality material and play very good after a few rounds of play to break in the canvas. More than the high quality of the bags is the even higher quality customer service. The set of grey bags I got were a little on the light side and when I informed SC Cornhole they immediately sent out a new set that were better in color. They are very responsive, understanding, and willing to work with their customers to ensure customer satisfaction. Highly recommend this company and I will always purchase my corn bags from them!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a well made durable set of cornhole bags, look no further. This is my second set of bags from SC Cornhole. The ONLY reason I needed a second set was because I left the first set that I've had for years outside overnight and local critter decided he needed to chew his way into a bag to get a taste of the contents. You will not be disappointed with these bags.
customer_reviews.author: RNLG

customer_reviews.title: Nice corn hole bags
customer_reviews.text: Nice corn hole bags, these had great reviews so I bought them for a new set I built for my family. Love that you can pick a mix of colors so it'll match the unconventional split house hold boards I made for my and my wife's school colors. Good weight balance and durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Ian L.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a long time
customer_reviews.text: These bags are solid. unfortunately i used them at a tailgate where there were a bunch of thorny weeds. Eventually it caused the bags to rip. but other than that they seemed like they would have lasted a long time if they were not abused. will buy them again when i need replacements.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of having to throw out corn bags that got wet. The last set we had didn't get wet, but still got a mildew all over the covers just by sitting in our garage. I will not buy corn bags again. These feel the same and throw the same as the corn bags...just minus the corn dust and I don't worry about getting them out and seeing all the mildew!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S. Cullison

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Cornhole Bags
customer_reviews.text: The cornhole set I purchased came with bags filled with chalk. There was constantly white chalk dust everywhere... including all of your hands and eventually your cloths. After about a year, one of the bags started to rip along a seam and the chalk was spilling out everywhere. I decided to buy a new set of bags, and found these. The bags feel very sturdy, and are filled with plastic beads instead of chalk, so they are not messy at all. So far they are holding up well. I'm pleased with the quality and the value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John Bator

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: These broke in nicely and relatively quickly. They're a great weight and the grains inside feel natural. A really nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Just not great. If you've never played these are fine. However they're SO stiff you can land the bag centered on the corn hole board and it may or may not fall in. The corners are stiff enough to hold a bag on top of the hole-centered. We purchased new bags elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: April Laue

customer_reviews.title: Will work, but not the best
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be well made and weather resistant, but they don’t fly like a normal bag and they consistently get stuck on the hole without going in, idk if it’s because they are to stiff or too big but we had to stop using them bc they would just clog up on the hole and not fall in
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Prairie

customer_reviews.title: Good construction but came with mold
customer_reviews.text: The stitching and feel of the bags is good. We got navy and beige ones, the navy had mold spots on them. We did ask for an exchange of the navy and it was quick, but even the replacement ones had mold on them. We looked over the beige ones and they were good, just the navy ones both times, original and replacements. At first, thought maybe just dust, but definitely had the hairy mold like food left in the fridge growth on them. We wiped them down and hoping the 'growth' does not come back. Other than that seem like good 'bags'.
customer_reviews.author: Stilt23

customer_reviews.title: well made and works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets for our wedding cornhole boards and they were perfect. the colors are exactly as shown, I had a harry potter wedding and needed the four house colors and this was great. They seem very well made and sturdy so I expect to use these for many years to come with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: khaleesi

customer_reviews.title: Durable Option
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement bags for all around play thus far. Wanted an option for durability, playability at reasonable price point. This one hits those thus far and worth the purchase - just require some use to break in as they're stiff out the box and onto the boards.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: These bags work great. They've seen a lot of use and are ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags work great. They've seen a lot of use and are still holding up great. They have a good weight to them and the quality of the material is top notch. There are a lot of different bags for sale and I'm so glad we chose these ones. The different color options are great as well. We went with navy and red and couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Jacobv

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best cornhole bags
customer_reviews.text: These duck cloth cornhole bags are so incredible heavy duty they will be the only cornhole bags I ever buy again. I absolutely love these bags. The duck cloth is very durable and can take a beating. Mine have lasted forever and I get asked by everyone where I purchased them from. Very High Quality and Made to Last. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C.K.Bigby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bags. These are my second set from this company. Ideal weight and play as expected on the boards. Heavy duty stitching that I expect will last for several seasons. The only thing I've noticed is some slight fading of the material if you leave them out in the sun too long.
customer_reviews.author: csciguy

customer_reviews.title: Durable, mold resistant , tournament legal bags.
customer_reviews.text: These bags work very well and they hold up to hard use. They feel good in your hand and are tournament legal. They also have the added benefit of not getting rotten and moldy. They’re easy to clean if they get dirty and you don’t have to worry about mold inside the bag.
customer_reviews.author: GSB

customer_reviews.title: Really Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bags but, they are very stiff and get hung up on the board holes. I've had two bags one on top of the other stuck on top of the hole. Hopefully in time they will wear in a bit and loose some of the stiffness. Other than that they are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: wildtrky

customer_reviews.title: Yay!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank God! I got screwed with a company that sold the corn filled ones. They had weavels but didn’t know until months later and the seller would not respond to me. These feel the same to me. This is recreational use!!! These will out live me!!!
customer_reviews.author: stacy kessler

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great material
customer_reviews.text: Great, strong material. They feel really durable and similar to other bags we have used. My husband was concerned about the stitching but it looks okay to me. We’re excited to break these in and see how they last. Overall, we are happy with the purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're Corn Bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are fine for the casual cornhole player. They are stitched pretty well so don't freak out if you see a thread or two after throwing a couple games. They hold up. I've probably played over 50 games with them in a span of 10 days and they are coming into their own. Cornhole is going the way of the double sided bag nowadays, but for the casual BBQ feel these bags do what they need to do especially with people just trying to have some fun. Solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Their original purpose was to help an elderly lady build up her arm strength because at that time she would not hold weights in her hands. She could hold the bags and do a versions of forearm curls for a 90 year old. Now she is getting around well on her own, and I will re-purpose the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Why Do I Need a Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Weather Resistant Cornhole Bags
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work pretty good. No issues holds together well after about 7 games so far. When first used they were stiff and almost didn't fit in the hole. After a a game or two they broke in and were fine and worked like they should.
customer_reviews.author: Stiggy

customer_reviews.title: Glad that we did
customer_reviews.text: Can I say "PERFECT " too many times? I was going to make my own, but when I saw how much the plastic pellets wee going to cost and that was before purchasing fabric, we decided to give these a try. Glad that we did. These are made from Great fabric, sewn perfectly, works perfect in the corn hole game. Great product. Just what we were looking for. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great spare set to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: Nice bags overall. We've used them a few times and no busted bags. Material is thick which is good and bad. At times bags are so square and stiff they are right at hole but get caught up on corner of bag. Hopefully after using a bit more they'll be broken in and not do that. But ultimately I bought them so we didn't have to use our good bags with kiddos visiting etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great solid bags!
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to cornhole bags the most important things are how they feel in your hand, the weight and material. These bags hit all three! They feel solid, good weight and the material is nice thick canvas with good stitching. I expect they are going to hold up well and I’m happy with the purchae
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product from a reliable company
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Cornhole bags from this same seller a couple of times now and I have had great products each time. They are a little still when they arrive and need breaking in but they are sturdy in the hand and play the game very well. I like the customer service of the company because they seem very invested on giving a good product by emailing and asking if there were any issues with the product. Overall great Cornhole bags from a good and reliable company and I strongly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: amazing quality and weight
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!! I totally suggest these. The price is higher then some but you will not need to replace these like the cheap ones. Save yourself the headache n disappointment and just buy these you will not be disappointed at all
customer_reviews.author: Marie B

customer_reviews.title: Great durable corn hole bags
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my real deal bags (that molded 🤢) with these synthetic bags. They did need some working and flexing out of the case to better conform when tossing them. They are made with quality material and look forward to using them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: John D DeGuzman

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not great bags. Weight is all over the place and bags are very firm like burlap nice a good quality bag. Holds up for driveway play and seems are too thick which creates a problem when bag lands on seam for corner throw.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: These are my second purchase of SC bags. I must say after a long season of throwing bags. My first set purchased this spring are still holding up well. Thought it was time for some new ones after I played with the other set (opponents set). My other 4 bags hit the concrete a lot more than my color choice. I expected wear and so should you. Heavy use on concrete will breakdown the filling unevenly so keep that in mind. These bad boys haven’t spilled a single thing like I’m used to before fall hits. Overall Great quality product. Two thumbs up guys!
customer_reviews.author: Michael McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bags for outdoor fun with the Boys and Beers at your tailgate!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for tournament quality bags used by sponsored tossers indoors in air conditioned sissy comfort, these aren’t it. If you are looking for the perfect bags for you and your buddies to hang out, drinking beers and have a great time tossing bags, these are it! Excellent quality, heavy cloth that will last for years out in the grass, dirt or asphalt parking lot at your tailgate!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Schoeninger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bags for your backyard festivities
customer_reviews.text: Needed some new bags for our backyard tournaments. My family is very competitive when it comes to cornhole. Our current bags are light and called "little B$iches". These are nice and heavy plus the added patriotic patters set the tone for the 4th of July!
customer_reviews.author: 3sheetsgone

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of Cornhole bags
customer_reviews.text: Seem like a good set of bags. I’m hoping they hold up. After a few games the corner seams show the slightest of fraying but I think it could be just the excess material on the ends. They feel like good quality and have a nice weight. We’ll have to play several games to break them in so the bags aren’t so stiff. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Iowa Hawkeyes colors and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I would purchase these again! Very high quality and heavy cloth like they're supposed to be!
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: Good bags, well made and compact.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are well made with a very durable material, but require a longer than normal break-in period as they're quite compact in comparison to my other bag sets which cause them to slide more than plop at first. We run tourneys on the weekend cookouts so we'll see how they hold up this season.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Bought them to match school colors and the yellow was more gold than yellow, which was what I was looking for. They felt good and worked well and there wasn't a dust cloud when they hit the board. These should last!
customer_reviews.author: The Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four sets of these cornhole bags. We used them at a huge family reunion. One of the bags developed a 3/8 inch tear but didn’t go through the second layer of material. It was still usable. SC Cornhole Games contacted me to see if I was enjoying the bags. I mentioned the 3/8 inch tear in my response and within 24 hours a representative contacted me. He went above and beyond to take care of the issue. The bags have been used for about 30 or 40 games each and I’m really pleased with them. I definitely recommend SC Cornhole bags and I especially appreciate their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Layne

customer_reviews.title: Price and it's not corn. So they last a lot longer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd set. I play on my lunch break on concrete. The last at least a year. The only reason I get another set it because over time after washing them and keeping up with them they just don't slide like when they new. So my coworkers want new ones. The last set is the 1st time my bag bust. They are true to the word about the warranty too. You get your money back and some.
customer_reviews.author: t-roy

customer_reviews.title: Faded fast, initial puffs of "smoke" when tossing
customer_reviews.text: The Orange ones I ordered faded very fast sitting on our covered patio. You cannot tell with the White (obviously). Also for the first few weeks they would both let off little puffs of "smoke" when they would hit the board. Not a huge problem, but was strange and I was worried what that was.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Really there are 2 categories: (1) Works or (2) Don't work. This works. Good durability, color hasn't faded much after two seasons. Can get a little gross if left outside in the rain....but hey, what do you expect. The washing machine, drying in the sun and all is better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Baggo!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for ones that came in a set. My family always begged for better ones. I found these and the reviews looked great. My family loves them! Loved that we could also get these in the colors we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Hip Mom

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I live in AZ and it is hard to find outdoor products that stand up to the heat. We have been using these bags for a year now and they have yet to breakdown like others we have tried. They do need broken in, but after that they are good.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerSara

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems to be great. I only played a handful of games with them, so not sure about how long they last. They are pretty firm when they arrive, the canvas softens up after a few games. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Mull

customer_reviews.title: The bags are durable and look good but they have a very thick and heavy stitch ...
customer_reviews.text: The bags are durable and look good but they have a very thick and heavy stitch on the end that was closed. If a bag is thrown and it lands or slides onto the hole it it will often sit right over the hole. Even hitting the original bag with additional throws isn't always enough to knock the bags in. They work but I probably wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler H

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong colors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Weather Resistant Cornhole bags (Set of 8) Orange and Navy Blue. They seems to have good weight and appear durable. The reason I gave this product 3 stars is because I ordered the orange and navy but received red and navy. Its not the end of the world but it would have been nice to get the correct colors. At this point, its not worth going through the trouble to send them back. Overall seems to be good bags but haven't actually played with them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color I chose, the black and grey are really nice. Classy bean bags lol. We started using them right away and haven’t had any problems with them. They were in perfect condition no rips or snags. I will definitely buy these again when ours wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Alannah Michalski

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! These are a good, consistent weight and the bags seem very durable which is important for tailgating on asphalt lots! These will be nice with the recycled plastic, my last bags were filled with some kind of rock chips and every time the bag hit the board it would release dust on the playing surface! So annoying
customer_reviews.author: M. Walling

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: The cornhole bags we purchased are outstanding. Very good weight; very professional feeling. These were a replacement for the bags that came with our cornhole but those are flimsy and light compared to these news ones. And it was good to be able to pick our own colors! These new bags are a huge hit. We all feel like we play better!
customer_reviews.author: Chris in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable so far! Nice weighting
customer_reviews.text: They have held up great so far. Will update if hat changes. Only issue I’ve found is that I can’t get them to go in the hole even though everyone else can. Maybe I need to call tech support.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Well made bags and no dust to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these bags for a month or two quite often. They appear to be well made and I really like the fact that they’re pellets, not corn. I don’t have to deal with the dust and bugs or the breakdown of those other fillers. Would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. I had ordered a different set from amazon that I returned being very disappointed. These were my fall back. They cost a bit more, but they were worth the additional expense. Excellent quality duck cloth. Weights are right on the money, and the bags are reasonably full, but to slack and not too stuffed. Stitches are holding nicely so far (though I still need to really break them in.) I am very pleased with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: The Mays

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend these cornhole bags.
customer_reviews.text: Had these just over a year and 3 bags ripped. It says they are protected for a year. So we are out the money here. We got them for the reviews that were great. Maybe we just got a bad set. The bags are in great shape, other that the 3 that ripped. It’s like they were cut with a knife. We play in soft people’s or grass. I wouldn’t recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: First time using them it decided to rain. We kept playing. Bags held up fine after about 10 games. They definition need breaking in. We'll see how they hold up in the long run, but perfect so far.
customer_reviews.author: CDD

customer_reviews.title: Great quality once broken in
customer_reviews.text: I got these because we have corn hole outside our business and dozens of people play everyday and we needed bags that could withstand frequent use. Great quality once used for a few days but so stiff they would not slide into the board easily when new. So far they have held up and the colors are vibrant, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: McK

customer_reviews.title: These feel like top quality bags
customer_reviews.text: These feel like top quality bags, they got just the right amount of weight, and the material feels super durable. I haven't gotten to test them at a tailgate yet to see how they hold up, but I imagine they'll do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: First impression are these are well made bags.
customer_reviews.text: Material is durable and should last at least one or two summers. I had my wife reinforce stitching as this seemed to be the biggest issue with other buyers' reviews. I am pleased with the quality of the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

customer_reviews.title: A little stiff
customer_reviews.text: Bags are holding up well although the yellow picks up and shows grass stains. The bags still seem a little stiff and will often hang just over the hole. (other bags I have used are more flexible and tend to pull through the hole easier).
customer_reviews.author: DDV

customer_reviews.title: Quality that lasts!
customer_reviews.text: We have a home in South Lake Tahoe and rent it when we are not home. Corn holing is popular here so I bought a set. We needed something that could withstand Tahoe weather and renters who can be rough on things. This set fit the bill perfectly and we love it. It's holding up well. If you are in Tahoe, stay at Wintershire and try it out for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So happy to get these!
customer_reviews.text: The fabric feels heavy duty and they are a good weight. I'm so happy to get these as some mice got into our storage shed over the winter and nibbled at our original bean bags. These are just like the originals. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Trace

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality Cornhole Bags
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality bags. Perfect uniform dimensions. Excellent construction. Would highly recommend. Have been enjoying some good games this summer. Can't do much else this year.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I bought these to replace the ones I had and they are much better quality then those! Hopefully they last for a few seasons and they look like they will!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Good bags for deceit price.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are really good bags for beginner corn hole players. The only issue I have is the durability of the bags. I’ve been having the bags for a few weeks now and the bags have been being used a good bit. They were never used in any really wet conditions, only in really hot and humid conditions. The material of the black bags has already faded to a grayish color. Also the bags are Already starting to have small strings dangling. Other then those 2 small issues, the bags are really good!
customer_reviews.author: Bruz

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy bags!
customer_reviews.text: We are just amature cornhole players, so for our needs, these bags are great! When looking them over, they appear to be high quality and I expect them to last for years. They are a good weight and feel very sturdy. I definitely recommend SC Cornhole.
customer_reviews.author: Cajudygirl

customer_reviews.title: corn hole bags
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Very good, sturdy material, perfect weight and wonderful print design. The family had so much fun playing corn hole. Thank you. I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Prickly

customer_reviews.title: Study with good weight to them!
customer_reviews.text: Good bags for the money. They slide well on my home crafted boards. Bags are made of thick material. Suggest not choosing black and blue as these colors do not contrast well especially in low light.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: Weather Resistant Cornhole Bags (Set of 8) by SC Cornhole:: Choose Your Colors
product_meta.description: The Weather Resistant Cornhole Bags by SC Cornhole Games was developed over 10 years ago after some players were asking for an alternative to the traditional corn hole bags filled with feed corn. Players complained of mice getting into their cornhole bags, mold developing if they happened to get wet, and the corn breaking down over time to the point where the corn hole bags were a fraction of the original weight. To address the problem, we came up with a blend of recycled plastic to mimic the feel of a traditional cornhole bean bag while addressing all the shortcomings! The bags are 6x6”, made with a durable 12 ounce duck canvas, and filled with 14-16 ounces of plastic filling. The result? A bag that plays like a “regulation” bag, but lasts MUCH longer! From the moment this product was introduced to the market, it became our most popular seller! Be careful though, there are many imitations of our product but none of them have the official SC Cornhole Games marking, durability, and 1-year guaranty! Those things are only available when you purchase directly through SC Cornhole Games.
feature_bullets: DURABLE MATERIAL-Made with 12 ounce durable duck canvas. Perfect for ANY type of play (grass, gravel, concrete)

OFFICIAL SIZED-Regulation size (6x6") and weight (14-16 ounces). These are officially sized bags that are meant for regular play. Cornhole bags found in retail chains do not compare to the durability and feel of SC Cornhole bags
WEATHER RESISTANT-Filled with recycled plastic pellets, making it weather and critter resistant.
1 YEAR GUARANTY-Our cornhole bags are backed by a guaranty to replace your bags in the case of failure. Buy with confidence.
TRUSTED BRAND-For over 10 years, SC Cornhole has provided high quality products to players. The reviews speak for themselves!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
